quest.name: Memento of a Friend
journal: Seto would make a personal request of you.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Urianger tells me you've been busy trying to win Seto over, and I agree that you're the best womanman for the job. A silver tongue can only get one so far.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I heard a fearsome roar... Is everything all right?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Whatever Seto hath in store for thee, I wish thee godsspeed.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: This is not a test of your strength, but a personal request. Please hear my tale.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: A while ago, I fought sin eaters who had wandered into Il Mheg. In the heat of battle, I dropped a prized possession─a medallion. Of all the places that it should fall, it was Longmirror Lake.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: We amaro are not fond of water─we certainly cannot dive very deep. I briefly entertained the thought of turning to the Fuath, but they are more likely to keep my medallion out of mischief than return it to me.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: I had despaired of retrieving my treasure, but having seen what you are capable of, perhaps you will be able to find it.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: While I ponder your request for the shoes, will you not go and search for my medallion? If it should elude even you, I will accept that it is gone forever.

dialogue.name: SETO
dialogue.text: As I recall, I was above the waters west of the castle when I dropped the medallion. I wish you luck.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This does not appear to be Seto's medallion.
